message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient is exhibiting symptoms of schizophrenia and his lack of response to haloperidol and risperidone suggests he has treatment-resistant schizophrenia. Clozapine is known to be effective in treatment-resistant schizophrenia and is the best next step in management. It is important to note that clozapine has potential side effects and requires close monitoring.
